room_title: Escape room "Magician’s Heist Competition" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
room_address: 1180 Scheels Drive Suite B-103 Sparks, NV 89434
room_description:
Magic is a cut-throat business. For the last apprentice of Frida Hatrick, the world’s most famous female magician, that was literally the case. Her previous apprentice made a near fatal mistake with a saw blade and now Frida wears a scarf around her neck to disguise the scar. But the show must go on!

Frida has recently announced an enormous magic tour spanning 50 countries and 5 continents and needs a new group of apprentices to help her amaze and astonish her worldwide audiences! Fame and fortune await the winner but to BE the best you have to BEAT the best. 

You are competing head-to-head with a rival team backstage of her latest show and must prove yourself worthy of her death-defying illusions, magic tests, and puzzles.

Solve the room and steal the golden key from the clutches of the competition. There can only be one victor!
